cwe_description: The product does not properly restrict the size or amount of resources that are requested or consumed by an actor, which can be used to exhaust available resources.
explanation: The function get_one_sourceline dynamically grows a buffer to read lines. If an input line contains an escaped newline (a newline preceded by an odd number of Ctrl-V characters), the function continues reading and growing the buffer. An attacker can craft a malicious input file where every newline is escaped, forcing the buffer to continuously expand and consume excessive memory, leading to a Denial of Service (DoS) due to uncontrolled resource consumption.
